metadata.description: The biggest crossover EVER starts here! The Mega Man/Sonic the Hedgehog epic kicks off with a bang as the Blue Blur and Blue Bomber meet for the first time. Will they join forces to stop Drs. Eggman and Wily's evil plans, or will they be too busy fighting each other?! You cannot miss this historic first meeting of two of the biggest video game icons in the entire world!
metadata.name: Sonic the Hedgehog/Mega Man: Worlds Collide
